title: Collaborative Mathematical Problem-Solving Simulation in Virtual Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Role-based collaborative activities in a VR environment based on IMS Learning Design standards.

learning_goals: Learners can solve complex problems using at least three mathematical interactions (discussions, role-playing, resource sharing) in VR environments
Learners can monitor peers' real-time activity status in an IMS LD-based interface and engage in collaborative simulations.

Learners can perform the roles of medical/legal/technical experts and solve context-specific mathematical application problems (e.g., hospital budget calculations, legal evidence analysis, engineering design) with 80% accuracy.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
